title: LinguaChat
description: A real-time chat translation app designed to bridge language barriers

title: Weekly
description: A mobile application to help bring friends together for events and activities
subDescription: → I worked as part of the iOS development team and took ownership of several components including status updates, event invitations, chat features, and availability management.

title: Portfolio v2
description: This portfolio I made to display my projects and experience.
subDescription: → I really enjoy 3D modeling and a low poly look so I've added some elements such as the earth model and the background of stars that uses custom shaders.

title: CPPEventMap
description: A web application for students of Cal Poly Pomona to easily find where events are occurring on or near campus.
subDescription: → I was the team lead of 5 peers, and led development effectively by bringing my team together to plan out the core features of the application, delegating tasks, and creating mockups using Figma.

title: AppTrack
description: A web application to help keep track and visualize job applications.
subDescription: → I made this app because I needed a focused app just for applications to help in my job hunt.

title: MyBookShelf
description: A desktop electron app to help organize pdf e-books and help with the e-reading experience.
subDescription: → I enjoy reading learning material and I wanted a better library-like experience so I made this desktop app.
